document.query: ALTER TABLE `sale_order` ADD `billing_address2` VARCHAR(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL AFTER `billing_address`;
ALTER TABLE `sale_order` ADD `billing_post_code` VARCHAR(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL AFTER `billing_address2`;
ALTER TABLE `sale_order` ADD `billing_state_id` VARCHAR(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL AFTER `billing_post_code`;
ALTER TABLE `sale_order` ADD `billing_city` VARCHAR(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL AFTER `billing_state_id`;
ALTER TABLE `sale_order` ADD `shipping_address2` VARCHAR(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL AFTER `shipping_address`;
ALTER TABLE `sale_order` ADD `shipping_post_code` VARCHAR(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL AFTER `shipping_address2`;
ALTER TABLE `sale_order` ADD `shipping_state_id` VARCHAR(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL AFTER `shipping_post_code`;
ALTER TABLE `sale_order` ADD `shipping_city` VARCHAR(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL AFTER `shipping_state_id`;
